# IMZAInvest

> UK investing education for beginners. Covers ISAs, SIPPs, ETFs, index funds, dividend investing, and long-term wealth building — written with FCA-compliant educational framing. A dad-and-daughter investing journey for UK families.

## About

IMZAInvest is a personal finance education platform built around a UK family's real investing journey. It covers the fundamentals of investing for UK beginners — from opening a first Stocks and Shares ISA to building a diversified portfolio with low-cost index funds. All content is for educational purposes only and does not constitute personalised financial advice.

## Topics Covered

- Stocks and Shares ISA (how they work, best providers)
- Junior ISA for children (JISA UK guide)
- SIPP and pension basics for UK investors
- Index funds and ETFs (Vanguard, iShares, HSBC)
- Dividend investing strategy
- Compound interest and long-term wealth building
- UK tax-efficient investing (ISA allowances, CGT)
- Investing platforms comparison (Vanguard UK, Freetrade, Trading 212, InvestEngine)
- Family investing and teaching kids about money

## Disclaimer

All content is educational only. Not financial advice. Past performance is not a guide to future returns. Investing involves risk.
